attr.title: Morrowind
attr.desc: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind is an open-world fantasy role-playing game set in the richly detailed province of Morrowind, part of the Elder Scrolls universe. Originally released by Bethesda in 2002, it offers deep lore, open-ended gameplay, and a sprawling world filled with quests, factions, and exploration. This version runs on OpenMW, an open-source reimplementation of the Morrowind engine, offering improved stability and numerous enhancements while preserving the original gameplay experience.
attr.inst: Copy your installed game data files from the `Data Files` directory or the both the GoG installer files `setup_the_elder_scrolls_iii_morrowind_goty_1.6.0.1820_gog_0.1_(77582).exe` to the `openmw/data` directory
attr.inst_md:
Install **"Morrowind Game of the Year Edition"** from either **Steam** or **GoG** and copy the contents of `Data Files` into `ports/openmw/data/`.

Alternatively place the **GoG** offline installer files (`setup_the_elder_scrolls_iii_morrowind_goty_1.6.0.1820_gog_0.1_(77582).exe` and `setup_the_elder_scrolls_iii_morrowind_goty_1.6.0.1820_gog_0.1_(77582)-1.bin`) into `ports/openmw/data/` and it will be installed correctly by the port when launched.
